name: Ragedanger Earth
description:
Ragedanger Earth - Demons and evil spirits rebelled! Grab your gun and take out the vicious creatures in this roguelike first-person shooter! Collect different weapons, first-aid kits and money, dodge enemies and bullets and remember - access to the next level will be given only after the destruction of all threats! Can you get to the end?..

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
